description.value: An extension to provide the reason why the medication was not taken or administered or was taken or administered differently.

purpose.value: This extension represents MedicationAdministrationReasonForDeviation of the Dutch zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicationAdministration2, in a development version that will be released in pre-publication 2022-1. This extension also contains augmentations to the zib based on the transactions of MP9, to provide an extension better suited for implementation purposes.
